summary: Once in 500 years, ancient mythical creatures come to Earth, wreaking havoc and destruction. This time they must be stopped.
cast: Jason Behr|Amanda Brooks|Robert Forster|Craig Robinson|Aimee Garcia|Chris Mulkey|John Ales|Elizabeth Peña|Billy Gardell|Holmes Osborne|NiCole Robinson|Geoff Pierson|Cody Arens|Kevin Breznahan|Jody Carlson|Dominic Oliver|Craig Anton|Patricia Lee|Eloy Casados|Alexa Sheehan|Matthias Hues|Gregory Hinton|Derek Mears|Gerard Griesbaum|Retta|Jane Silvia|Hyun Jin Park|Hyojin Ban|Ji-hwan Min|Jongman Lee|Kyungpyo Lee|Junkai|Kyuho Moon|Enci|Rob Roy Fitzgerald|Joe Don Harris|James Intveld|Jamie Kaler|Pete Kasper|Anthony Molinari|Art Oughton|Michael Shamus Wiles|Cheyenne Alexis Dean|Eric Burson|Roberta Farkas|Ethan Grant|Kaycee|Ricky Kim|Scott Lunsford|Paulah May|Nathan Mills|Jesse Jam Miranda|Rodney Scott|Richard Steen
title: Dragon Wars
